text.autoconfig.totemquick.title: TotemQuick Settings
text.autoconfig.totemquick.option.enable: Enables or disables the TotemQuick mod
text.autoconfig.totemquick.option.sesliU: Plays a sound when the totem is equipped or runs out
text.autoconfig.totemquick.option.uyarir: Color of the message shown when the totem runs out (example: red, yellow, purple)
text.autoconfig.totemquick.option.elytra: Hides the Elytra model on the player's back
